title: Filter prepared from Janus-like graphene oxide nanosheets with heterogeneous nanochannels for highly efficient dye removal
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00228H, Paper
Yingkun Song, Zejun Zhang, Hongsheng Yang, Xin Luan, Jianming Zhang, Gang Wei
The filters assembled with graphene oxide (GO) nanosheets featuring uniform nanochannels exhibit excellent performance for molecular separation and hold great potential for water purification. However, the long and curved nanochannels...
